text: ve log allaah se hatakar unako poojate hain, jo na unaka kuchh bigaad saken aur na unaka kuchh bhala kar saken. aur ve kahate hai, "ye allaah ke yahaan hamaare sifaarishee hai." kah do, "kya tum allaah ko usakee khabar denevaale? ho, jisaka astitv na use aakaashon mein gyaat hai na dharatee mein" mahimaavaan hai vah aur usakee uchchata ke pratikool hai vah shirk, jo ve kar rahe hai
